name: locale-util
description: Locale data generators written in node.js. Uses reliable sources. Generated data available as JS/JSON objects.

scripts.update-core: node generators/core/phoneNumberMetadata.js && node generators/core/supplementalData.js && node generators/core/main.js && node generators/core/currencies.js && node generators/core/subdivisions.js && node generators/core/timezones.js
scripts.update-extra: node generators/extra/currencyCodes.js && node generators/extra/countryCodes.js && node generators/extra/languageNamesByCode.js && node generators/extra/languageCodes.js && node generators/extra/currencyCodesByCountry.js && node generators/extra/timezonesByCountry.js && node generators/extra/countryOfficialLanguages.js && node generators/extra/countryNamesByCode.js && node generators/extra/divisions.js
scripts.update-all: npm run update-core && npm run update-extra && node generators/jstz-update-dst-rules
